existing_features.title: Build a calculator UI with a numeric display, digit buttons (0–9), decimal point, operator buttons (+, −, ×, ÷), equals button, and a clear/reset button. Operations should call the backend actor functions.

Apply a clean, modern visual theme with a dark charcoal background, crisp white display text, and bold accent colors for operator keys. Use a minimal sans-serif typography and a card-style layout centered on the page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Basic calculator with arithmetic operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide)
Implement a backend actor that exposes arithmetic functions: add, subtract, multiply, and divide. Division should return an error or null when dividing by zero.
